entries.caption: Weapon Group Assignment
entries.not_a_pilot: Only the pilot can manage the weapon group assignments.
entries.help_weapon_group: These are you weapon groups. You can assign weapons of a similar type to these groups for use in combat.
entries.help_all_weapons: These are your unassigned weapons. These weapons are available to be added to one of your weapon groups.
entries.help_buttons_addremove: Use these buttons to assign or unassign weapons to or from your selected weapon group.
entries.help_selected: These are the weapons in your currently selected weapon group.
